content.raw:
@michael_deleo, I made a [pull request](https://bitbucket.org/michael_deleo/gazebo/pull-requests/1/merge-from-osrf-gazebo-default-to-fix/diff) to your repository merging osrf default into this branch to fix conflicts.

On the following link you can see how **this** pull request will look like if you merge **that** pull request into your default branch. It's a comparison between my `density_inspector` branch, which is branched off this, and osrf's `default` branch.

 https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/gazebo-michael_deleo/branches/compare/chapulina/gazebo-michael_deleo:density_inspector%0Dosrf/gazebo:default

The first commit was just merging from default and making sure the branch compiled. For that I had to adapt some things to the opaque pointer style (adding `dataPtr`) in `ConfigWidget` and `LinkInspector`.

There's also another [commit](https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/gazebo-michael_deleo/commits/b908c5aeb8f1717447452dfaac6a350e86e9c5cf), with these changes:

* Use ign-math helpers
* Update header guard style
* Make some input params const
* Fix `LinkInspector` test

Note that there are still failing tests, such as `CollisionConfig_TEST` and I might have broken something during the merges.

Also note that we're currently in [feature freeze](http://gazebosim.org/#status), and in less than 2 weeks we'll be in code freeze. Anything which isn't merged by then will not make it into Gazebo7. I think it would be really cool to have this in Gazebo7, so please let me know how I can help with this pull request. Thanks!!!
content.html:
@michael_deleo, I made a pull request to your repository merging osrf default into this branch to fix conflicts.

On the following link you can see how this pull request will look like if you merge that pull request into your default branch. It's a comparison between my density_inspector branch, which is branched off this, and osrf's default branch.

https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/gazebo-michael_deleo/branches/compare/chapulina/gazebo-michael_deleo:density_inspector%0Dosrf/gazebo:default

The first commit was just merging from default and making sure the branch compiled. For that I had to adapt some things to the opaque pointer style (adding dataPtr) in ConfigWidget and LinkInspector.

There's also another commit, with these changes:

  • Use ign-math helpers
  • Update header guard style
  • Make some input params const
  • Fix LinkInspector test

Note that there are still failing tests, such as CollisionConfig_TEST and I might have broken something during the merges.

Also note that we're currently in feature freeze, and in less than 2 weeks we'll be in code freeze. Anything which isn't merged by then will not make it into Gazebo7. I think it would be really cool to have this in Gazebo7, so please let me know how I can help with this pull request. Thanks!!!
